p: Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has had a profound impact on global health since December 2019. One potential complication of COVID-19 is acute ischemic stroke (AIS), especially in patients with cardiovascular disease1,2, which is associated with increased morbidity and mortality compared to AIS without COVID-192–4. Introducing vaccines against COVID-19 in December 2020 dramatically altered the course of the COVID-19 pandemic, with over 13.64 billion total vaccine doses administered worldwide5.
